body:
Aleksandar B. Samardzic wrote:
> I'm trying to download Radiance, but radsite.lbl.gov seems to be 
> unreachable (I tried from 2 different locations from Europe). Any 
> hint here? Is Radiance (for Linux) available at Radiance Workshop ISO
> image (just downloading it)?




Hi Aleksandar-


It appears to be unreachable from here (east coast of the USA) as well. 
  AFAIK, Radiance was not distributed on the workshop CD.  I'm sure it's 
just a temporary outage; you might want to just try again tomorrow at 
radsite.lbl.gov.








      Rob Guglielmetti


e. rpg@rumblestrip.org
w. www.rumblestrip.org
